summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackMilani Conceal + Perfect is a foundation + concealer makeup multitasker that combats under eye circles, redness and imperfections for flawless skin.
details: DetailsFeaturesBest-selling multi-tasking foundation and concealer formulaProvides medium to full coverage that goes hard all day, every dayNatural matte finishLongwear, oil-free formulaWaterproof & SweatproofCruelty-FreeMade in USA100% agree their skin looks more even*93% agree skin texture is smoothed and redness is reduced*93% agree their complexion looks fresh and natural*90% agree they have a flawless, photo-ready complexion**Results observed in a consumer panel surveyBenefitsThis smart formula applies evenly to conceal and even out tone for a natural matte finishOne flawless, skin-perfecting stepItem 2519968How To UseApply a dime-sized amount of product with fingertips or a brush beginning at the center of the face, blending outward.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Cyclopentasiloxane, Isononyl Isononanoate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Mica, Glycerin, BIS-PEG/PPG-14/14 Dimethicone, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Bis-Vinyl Dimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Ozokerite, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Beeswax (Cera Alba), Glycereth-18 Ethylhexanoate, Potassium Sorbate, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Isododecane, Propylene Carbonate, Prunus Domestica Fruit Extract, Glycereth-18, Aluminum Dimyristate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Allantoin, C30-45 Alkyl Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyisobutene, C18-21 Alkane. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Apply a dime-sized amount of product with fingertips or a brush beginning at the center of the face, blending outward.
ingredients: C18-21 Alkane. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: Great coverage!
reviews.comments: I love this foundation! Great coverage without feeling caked on. Lasts all day without needing to be touched up.

reviews.headline: Back to the lab!
reviews.comments: This formula feels heavy no matter how light I apply to my face. I've tried many primers with also a great skin care routine and if just doesn't last long. I get oily so fast no matter what products I use to stay in place. Its not for me, maybe for others. I got the neutral shade but it left me with a light cast. I don't like how messy it gets even when I don't use it.

reviews.headline: Bad
reviews.comments:
Super creasy does nothing
DO NOT BUY

reviews.headline: Holy Grail!!
reviews.comments: This is the best full coverage Foundation. I don't use any more high-end because they don't even compare to this.

reviews.headline: No, no, no!!
reviews.comments: This formula is super greasy. Left my face shiny and oily. Did not offer much coverage. It says it has concealer included, but the coverage says otherwise. Did not like at all. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Third time purchasing!!
reviews.comments: I love this concealer it works so nice and is smooth

reviews.headline: Conceals dark spots better than many concealers!
reviews.comments: I used to buy much pricier foundations and happened to try this once. Clinique has gotten rid of their high coverage foundations, and I was searching for one like this. It leaves my skin looking clear and radiant and lasts about the same as any other foundation I have used. I can switch back and forth in summer and winter between two shades.  Over time, I have gone through at least 10 purchases of this foundation and will continue to use it. It does not settle into my pores or wrinkles. I do set it in a few spots with transluscent powder.

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: makes me look like i dont have makeup on

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I have oilt skin and tbis is the best concealer/ foundation. It doesn't leave my facw looking cakey, don't have to use a lot of product, great coverage, and it blends wonderfully. Wayyyy better than thr matte maybeline fit me foundation

reviews.headline: Love this foundation
reviews.comments: I've only ever used high end foundations, because I never had luck with drugstore brands. This foundation is a game changer. I absolutely love it! The coverage is exceptional and a little goes a long way. I waited to try it and I'm so glad i eventually did.

reviews.headline: Not great for oily skin
reviews.comments: This foubdatuon coverage is amazing but this si def not for oily skin has you looking greasy in hours

reviews.headline: Best Foundation at Any Price Point
reviews.comments: This has an unparalleled selection of shades, and excellent coverage that is buildable yet looks light and dewy with the right skin preparation.

reviews.headline: This is my new favorite foundation
reviews.comments: I've tried dozens of different foundations and this one is my favorite. Normally I have a hard time with foundation breaking apart on my face and becoming flaky but this stays all day.

reviews.headline: Milani 2 in 1 Foundation and Concealer
reviews.comments:
My pros for this product much outweigh the cons! It's a great shade match for me, and I was very impressed at how many shades there are to choose from. The price for how much product you are getting is fabulous. The coverage is great, and for undereyes it's buildable. It blends great. And a little goes a long ways!
For cons, I am not sure if it was this or a different product, but it did make my undereye area burn really really badly. It didn't burn anywhere else I applied it, so it's possible it could have been something else. The only other con is that towards the end of the day, it starts to crease a bit. Although I noticed if you take a dry beauty blender and dab it a bit in the creasing areas, it smooths out nicely.
For reference, I have combination skin!

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this but my skin revolted. It broke me out worse than any other product ive ever used. Tiny little bumps and deeper pimples that just wouldnt go away. It also smells like paint.

reviews.headline: Milani Light Beige Concealer
reviews.comments: I actually love it so far i just got it todaya nd tried it the same day. I'm mexican so i have a olive undertone‚Ä¶basically yellow üßç‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚Ä¶.and i never rlly find a good shade ever i always have ti mix producs so YAY i found the right shade for now. Its very blendable. Its my spring shade for now until my summer shade. I wore it without powder and loved it. i use it for concealer not really foundation and it worked and had enough coverage. People talk about the smell but also are the ones talking about how lotions and skin care products with fragrence is bad (which is true) thats why i do not mind the little off smell. its honestly just a makeup smell. I reccomend 100%

reviews.headline: Rash Reaction
reviews.comments: Made my face burn and break out in a rash the second time I tried it.

reviews.headline: great
reviews.comments: Awesome!!!

reviews.headline: Not Great For Oily Skin
reviews.comments: It is the worst foundation for oily skin. My T-zone is oily and this did not last. It moved around within an hour of application on my t-zone. Will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: Foundation and concealer
reviews.comments: After spending big bucks for foundations, I decided to try this budget friendly duel purpose foundation 2 in 1.  I used the color finder comparing it to my current IT foundation in medium which is my perfect winter color.  I got the color recommend and its several shades darker then my IT. The forumula is very thick but applies easily and blends well. The coverage was good but it left my skin dry looking and did accentuate fine lines. I will try again using less product. I dont think it worked under my eyes as well as using an actual concealer and thats fine.

faceoff_positive.comments: I had to switch foundations after realizing my Kat Von D foundation was actually EATING my skin, making my breakouts a lot worse, and causing really deep cystic pimples/staph infections (I'd get pimples, pop them PROPERLY then after applying foundation to cover them they'd turn into these giant flat scabby patches that would take over a month to heal and would scar a lot) I've got very dry skin with a slightly oily t-zone and the KVD foundation would "crack", settle into my pores, and cling horribly to my dry patches, so obviously I needed to switch foundations but couldn't afford to shell out $40+ for another high end foundation, so after reading a lot of reviews I gave this one a shot, and am seriously impressed. I'll give you my whole routine since some people seem to be having issues with it, I start off with NYX's honey dew me up primer (which is also GREAT as a night serum and has seriously helped my skin) and a little spritz of NYX's matte setting spray on my t-zone to help control oil, then buff a pump and a half into my face and neck with it cosmetic's airbrush foundation brush (it works nicely with a beauty blender too, but goes on sheerer this way), set it using the KVD powder foundation, generously spray with the NYX matte setting spray, then gently pat my whole face with a damp beauty blender (this step isn't necessary, but it helps merge the powder and cream together to keep it from looking cakes and gives me a really pretty flawless finish) I did my makeup at 9 am, and it's 7:30 now and my foundation still looks flawless, it covers blemishes and discoloration completely without needing any concealer, it's doesn't cling to my dry patches at all, doesn't settle into my pores, and holds up beautifully. It's doesn't crack or cake up like my KVD foundation would, and stays put if you have to blot it. My only complaints would be the VERY limited shade range, and it does oxidize a little so if you're between shades go with the lighter one.
faceoff_positive.headline: Surprisingly good

faceoff_negative.comments: I really wanted to like this foundation, and I did upon the initial application. It went on smoothly, was easy to blend, and seemed to cover a decent amount. However, after less than an hour of wear, I noticed the foundation oxidized very badly and looked orange on my very fair skin (and I bought the lightest shade they make, 00A Porcelain). Also, the foundation had settled into my pores and made them look awful! I don't consider myself to be someone with very bad or noticeable pores at all, and I use a skincare regimen daily, but this foundation made it look like I was covered in blackheads! And that was with using the pore-minimizing Porefessional primer by Smashbox. Additionally, after less than an hour of wear, the foundation had worn off along my jaw/lower cheekbone and my redness was peeking through badly. To sum up, I liked how this foundation looked when I first applied it, but it just got worse and worse the longer I wore it (which was less than an hour!).
faceoff_negative.headline: Makes Pores Look Awful!
